body: The error is happening because "Outside Boundary Condition Object" is empty inside the idf file. We can get this fixed but do you really need to import an idf file instead of creating it inside Rhino? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/MlwUY2Ci1elWq2JztwA3BAbXLwzOcep9l4WF2MLV3rK2Bb*pl1GRW6O8tSMyJGokCt4nCt7N3BMa8RZgubRyklcQahKK7npS/idf_BCObject.PNG)
